metadata.title: CVE-2015-1370 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incomplete blacklist vulnerability in marked 0.3.2 and earlier for Node.jsallows remote attackers to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks via avbscript tag in a link.

criterions.comment: node-marked package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
